title: Plate, "Star, Wheat, Harvesting Tools", 1921
markings: Marks: On underside: Imperial Porcelain Factory mark obscured by green enamel oval; hammer, sickle, cog, 1921 hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with shaped edge; in the center a star-shaped panel with wheat- sheaf, rake, sythe, pitch fork, sickle, surrounded by stylized vegetation; a border of blue suggesting cornflower petals

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Star, Wheat, Harvesting Tools", 1921.
1921. porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-19.
